Text.Page: Those {@LinkCreature:31#25#onyx hydraths} are strange creatures indeed. So strange that the Mysterium wants to take a closer look. Make them some carcasses and report back to Leuwra at Coastal Overwatch camp.

Thank you for your help. The remains of the onyx hydrath will be sent to Allemantheia for further research, but extra samples wouldn't hurt.

Bring me more onyx hydraths and I'll keep rewarding you.
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
